import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Answer Component"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/widget/answerComponents/{answerComponentId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves an answer component by its unique identifier. Answer components are interactive elements that can be embedded within AI assistant responses to enhance user experience, such as action buttons, forms, carousels, or custom widgets.

**Answer Components:**
Answer components allow you to create rich, interactive experiences within AI responses. They are referenced in the `answerComponents` array of generated responses and can include various types of interactive elements that users can engage with directly in the conversation.

**Component Validation:**
The endpoint validates the component content structure according to its declared type to ensure correct rendering and functionality. If the content doesn't match the expected schema for the component type, an error will be returned.

**Common Use Cases:**
- Action buttons for quick user actions (e.g., "Book Now", "Learn More")
- Forms for data collection (e.g., contact forms, surveys, lead capture)
- Interactive widgets for enhanced engagement
- Custom components tailored to specific business needs

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Unique identifier of the answer component","in":"path","name":"answerComponentId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>

</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>

</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Answer component data with validated content","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"answerComponentId":{"type":"string"},"answerComponentType":{"type":"string"},"content":{"type":"object"},"createdAt":{"type":"string"},"id":{"type":"string"},"projectId":{"type":"string"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}},"404":{"description":"Answer component not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"code":{"enum":["server","user","not-found","db","vector-db","external"],"type":"string","x-enum-comments":{"CodeDB":"Database errors","CodeExternal":"External service errors, HTTP 502","CodeNotFound":"Resource not found, HTTP 404","CodeServer":"Internal server errors, HTTP 5xx","CodeUser":"User errors, HTTP 4xx","CodeVectorDB":"Vector database errors"},"x-enum-varnames":["CodeServer","CodeUser","CodeNotFound","CodeDB","CodeVectorDB","CodeExternal"]},"id":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error or content validation failure","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"code":{"enum":["server","user","not-found","db","vector-db","external"],"type":"string","x-enum-comments":{"CodeDB":"Database errors","CodeExternal":"External service errors, HTTP 502","CodeNotFound":"Resource not found, HTTP 404","CodeServer":"Internal server errors, HTTP 5xx","CodeUser":"User errors, HTTP 4xx","CodeVectorDB":"Vector database errors"},"x-enum-varnames":["CodeServer","CodeUser","CodeNotFound","CodeDB","CodeVectorDB","CodeExternal"]},"id":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>

</StatusCodes>
